name: Gaogamon
description: Gaogamon resembles a large blue Akita Inu dog with black nose and claws, fangs, yellow eyes, a white belly, thick light-blue mane with braids, white tail tip, feet tips, snout, inner ears, and a yellow cross-shaped mark in the forehead. It wears black belts and red and black boxing gloves on its front paws with its claws piercing through the gloves, white bandages on its legs, and red ribbons on its back.
